title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.1 - Application of subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.1 - Application of subpart

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to hearings on charges against
tenured school employees pursuant to section
3020-a
of the

Education Law that are commenced by the filing of charges on or after August
25, 1994 and prior to July 1, 2015. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 2, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 48, eff. 12/2/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
